page.title: 17Shiskine Valley Employment
page.content: A very large proportion of the people resident in the Shiskine valley are self-employed, or are helping in the family business. The valley is remarkably well off for facilities and trade services. In addition to the several farmers there are the four hoteliers, a few shop owners (including a butcher who is trying to get an abattoir built), a hairdresser, a builder,an electrician, a plumber, three joiners, a baker, and of course the garage and haulage family business. Many of the private businesses provide full-time employment (extra part-time in summer) -hence no great unemployment problem. Two ministers, two doctors (spouses),three teachers and three auxiliary staff at the school completes the employment scene.
